featured.text: Almost everything, from food to machinery, comes by way of the sea in huge ships piloted by captains.

definition.zh_def: 海洋，指地球表面的大水體，通常比湖泊大，並且與陸地相接。
definition.en_def: A large body of saltwater that covers most of the Earth's surface and is divided into oceans and seas.
definition.example: The children played happily by the sea.
